input.value: data warehouse, devops, technical leadership, data analysis, big data, python, java

div.div: data warehouse, devops, technical leadership, data analysis, big data, python, java

div.p: We are Athene. At Athene, we are driven to do more. We are a leading retirement services company that issues, reinsures and acquires retirement savings products designed for the increasing number of individuals and institutions seeking to fund retirement needs. We see every day as a new opportunity to measure ourselves against the best - and then we don't stop until we've set the bar even higher. We're ready to help you achieve more.
Builds and maintains Data Warehousing applications that assist the company in minimizing administrative costs and maximizing information flow.

ul.li: Lead large project efforts in programming-based data warehouse design, development and testing
Provide technical advice to senior IT management or project managers, assisting them with high level planning or issue resolution
Mentor team members of all levels on application design and development
Monitor data warehousing system to ensure reliability and accuracy of information loaded into the databases
Resolve complex software issues across multiple software applications and platforms
Seek continuous improvement in performance of data warehouse load and consumption processes
Work cross functionally to implement data driven projects
Analyze and document source systems’ data domains and inter-relationships to enable rapid ingestion into warehousing environment and provision high quality and consumable data
Assist in the development of internal policies and procedures (standards, controls and metrics)
Build and maintain high performing ETL (Extract, Transform and Load) processes
Define Big Data implementation framework and lead implementation of advanced analytics capabilities
Effectively communicate and document the application architecture utilizing industry standards as part of a team
Ensure quality and controls are in place, managing escalations and developing and recommending solutions
Execute unit/string testing; may lead creation of development unit/string test plans; Solid understanding of QA testing plans
Implement / follow DevOps methodology and tool sets
In partnership with QA, ensure that existing and proposed software applications meet IT standards, as well as business and customer requirements
6+ years of Data Warehouse experience
2+ years Technical Leadership experience
Ability to independently manage a delivery team and successfully execute large solutions, while maintaining communication with the business unit
Advanced skills in Project Management and SDLC processes
Experience in Agile development methodology and DevOps implementations is required
Experience in Data Analysis and knowledge of underlying subject areas in respective project domains
Expert knowledge of large-scale internal software applications or related technologies
MUST HAVE Big Data experience
Programming background and an ability to assist developers as needed, Python or Java preferred
Strong sense of teamwork and ability to both lead and execute programs
Ability to function as a strategic partner within a team
Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Systems Analysis or equivalent work experience

p.br: NOTE: Successful candidate will be required to complete a pre-employment background check.

div.p: Want to learn more about Athene? Athene is driven to hire America’s veterans.

Athene is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, gender, gender identity, national origin, age, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, pregnancy, marital status, veteran status, or any other status protected by federal, state, or local law.
